definition[0]: to reduce the amount of something that is present or available
example[0]: Salmon populations have been severely depleted.
explanation[0]: Deplete is often passive in this meaning
definition[1]: to greatly reduce the amount of something, using up nearly all of it
example[1]: Drastic measures will need to be taken if fish stocks in Europeâ€™s seas are not to be disastrously depleted.
